briefTitle: A Comparative Study Between PF-06410293 and Humira® in Combination With Methotrexate in Participants With Active Rheumatoid Arthritis
officialTitle: A RANDOMIZED COMPARATIVE STUDY ASSESSING THE SWITCHING BETWEEN PF-06410293 AND HUMIRA (REGISTERED) IN COMBINATION WITH METHOTREXATE IN PARTICIPANTS WITH MODERATELY TO SEVERELY ACTIVE RHEUMATOID ARTHRITIS
summary: The study will assess the impact of pharmacokinetics (PK), safety and immunogenicity after switches between PF-06410293 and adalimumab and with continuous dosing with adalimumab in combination with methotrexate in subjects with moderately to severely active rheumatoid arthritis.

primaryOutcome.measure: Maximum Observed Serum Concentration (Cmax) of Adalimumab
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Pre-dose, 48, 72, 96, 144, 240 and 336 hours post dose on Day 211 (Week 30)
